title: Postgame Show: Call Me R.J.
description:
It's time for some Miami Heat Basketball! Before the Heat play tonight, we dive into Tyler Herro's ascension, Kyle Lowry's play at Point Guard, and a very unfortunate nickname from Jimmy Butler.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
